tutorial.speak:
Let's learn how to add lessons in Lessons.Church as an admin.
First, go to Lessons.Church and click on login.
Enter your credentials and click sign in.
Select your organization.
Click your name or the organization's name at the top right.
Select Admin.
Click the plus sign on the program you want to work on.
To add a new program, use the plus sign in the top right.
To add a new study in an existing program, click the plus study button.
Set whether the study should be live. Usually set to no initially for review.
Add a numerical value for the study's order.
Enter the study name.
Create a slug for the URL - no caps or spaces allowed.
Add a one-sentence description.
You can add a longer description here.
If you have a YouTube video, enter the embedded link.
Add a series graphic - this is required. Click anywhere in the gray box.
Click Upload and choose your image.
Adjust the image using the corner handles.
Click Update and then Save before leaving the page.
To create a lesson, click the lesson button under the study.
Set whether the lesson should be live - usually no initially.
Add a numerical value for the lesson's order.
Enter the lesson name, typically the lesson number.
Create a slug for the URL - no caps or spaces.
Add a longer description for the lesson.
If you have a YouTube video, enter the embedded URL.
Add a lesson graphic following the same steps as the series graphic.
To add files, click on Files from the Study Level.
Click the plus sign to add a new bundle.
Name your bundle and click save.
Click plus Resource to add files to your bundle.
Enter a resource name and click save.
Click the arrow to open your bundle folder.
Click Add to add files to your resource.
You can add three types of files: Variants for download and player, Assets for player only, or Bulk Add Assets.
Choose your file and label the variant with its file type.
To create venues, click on Venues.
Click the plus button to add a new venue.
Enter the venue name and click save.
After creating Large and Small Group venues, click edit on the venue you want to modify.
Click the plus button to add a new section.
Select Create New.
Enter a section name and any material notes, then click save.
Add your first role, typically the presenter.
There are five action types: Say, Do, Play, Download, and Note.
Select the appropriate action and enter the material.
Finally, mark the Lesson and Study as live, then test everything on Lessons.Church.
